actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 3304(a) of title 5, United States Code, to provide for oral examinations in the competitive service.

summary.text: Provides for oral examinations in the competitive services for the purpose of converting a Federal employees's indefinite appointment or temporary appointment to a career appointment. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 3304 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3304(a) of title 5, United States Code, to provide for oral examinations in the competitive service.
